#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
#include <algorithm>
#include <climits>

void process(std::vector<int> &girls,std::vector<int> &boys)
{
  int diff = INT_MAX;
  std::sort(girls.begin(),girls.end());
  std::sort(boys.begin(),boys.end());

  int m = girls.size();
  int n = boys.size();
  for(int i=0,j=0;i<m && j<n;)
  {
    diff = std::min(diff,std::abs(girls[i] - boys[j]));
    if(girls[i] < boys[j])
      i++;
    else
      j++;
  }
  std::cout << diff << std::endl;
}

int main()
{
  int n;
  int num;
  std::vector<int> girls,boys;

  std::cin >> n;
  for(int i=0;i<n;++i)
  {
    std::cin >> num;
    girls.push_back(num);
  }
  std::cin >> n;
  for(int i=0;i<n;++i)
  {
    std::cin >> num;
    boys.push_back(num);
  }
  process(girls,boys);
  return 0;
}
